Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad: Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad (abbreviated IIT Hyderabad or IITH) is a public technical research university located at Kandi Village of outskirts of the Sangareddy in Sangareddy district in the Indian state of Telangana.[1] As with all Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs), IIT Hyderabad is an Institute of National Importance.
